(Simplified: 郧)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 員 indicates the sound; 阝 (place) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 員 [ yuán ] employee; member; personnel, staff
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
①古國名，在今中國湖北省安陸縣。
②古地名，在今中國江蘇省如臬縣。
③姓氏。
鄖縣 [ yún xiàn ]: Yun county in Shiyan 十堰 , Hubei
鄖西 [ yún xī ]: Yunxi county in Shiyan 十堰 , Hubei
鄖西縣 [ yún xī xiàn ]: Yunxi county in Shiyan 十堰 , Hubei

鄖字的基本解释

鄖
yún
见“郧”。

鄖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yún］
［《廣韻》王分切，平文，云。］
“郧1”的繁体字。
(1)古国名。在今湖北省安陆市，一说在湖北省郧县。春秋时为楚所灭。
(2)古邑名。春秋卫地。
(3)古邑名。春秋吴地。在今江苏省如皋县东。

鄖字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄖； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1276第01
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】?于分切，音云。國名。【說文】漢南之國。【左傳·桓十一年】鄖人軍于蒲騷。【註】鄖國，在江夏雲社縣東南有鄖城。　又衞地。【左傳·哀十一年】衞太叔疾死，?于鄖。　又姓。　或省作䢵。詳前䢵字註。

Yun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yún］
["Guangyun" Wang divided cut, plain text, cloud. ]
Traditional characters for "郧1".
(1) Ancient country name. In today's Anlu City, Hubei Province, one said it was in Yun County, Hubei Province. It was destroyed by Chu in the Spring and Autumn Period.
(2) The name of the ancient town. Spring and Autumn Guards.
(3) The name of the ancient town. Spring and Autumn Wudi. In today's east of Rugao County, Jiangsu Province.
